result.arabic_text: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَٰلَكُمۡ وَنُنشِئَكُمۡ فِي مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ
result.translation: from transforming you and recreating you in forms that you do not know[7].
result.footnotes: [7] Or "from replacing you by others like yourselves [in this life] and creating you [in the Hereafter] in that which you do not know."
